member.name: M:GMC2Snooper.BMPViewer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GMC2Snooper.BMPViewer.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.NLoop
member.summary: Holds the data size of the primitive.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.Eop
member.summary: Specifies whether the following data is the last primitive in a GS packet.

remarks.para: A value of 0 means that more GIFtags with more primitives will be sent after the current primitive.
A value of 1 indicates that the following primitive data is the last in the packet.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.Pre
member.summary: Specifies whether the PRIM field in the GIFtag is enabled.
member.remarks: A value of 0 ignores the prim field, while a value of 1 outputs the PRIM field to the PRIM register.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.Prim
member.summary: Contains data to be set in the PRIM register.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.Flg
member.summary: Contains the data format for the primitive.

member.name: P:GMC2Snooper.PS2.GifTag.NReg
member.summary: Holds the number of register descriptors (REGS), up to a maximum of 16 values.
